messages.msgSnippet: El honor es mucho mas de los que la propia palabra significa... Toshimi Hira I can understand spanish as well, write me and we can share some experiences.
messages.messageBody:
El honor es mucho mas de los que la propia palabra significa...

Toshimi Hira

I can understand spanish as well, write me and we can share some experiences.

thira@...

gerardo rivera <alakida2003@...> wrote:
i realy dont now any other people that think that honor is a must to die for but personaly honor is something you learn since the day you born and its the honor,tradition and skills that help you fine the real meaning of life y belive that honor is everityng and that the samurais code is a must in the nolege of the question what is my road.
